description: Retrieves the security configuration for a specified catalog.

nested_items.name: EncryptionAtRest
nested_items.description: Specifies the encryption-at-rest configuration for the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: CatalogEncryptionMode
nested_items.description: The encryption-at-rest mode for encrypting Data Catalog data.

nested_items.name: SseAwsKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key to use for encryption at rest.

nested_items.name: CatalogEncryptionServiceRole
nested_items.description: The role that Glue assumes to encrypt and decrypt the Data Catalog objects on the caller's behalf.

nested_items.name: ConnectionPasswordEncryption
nested_items.description: When connection password protection is enabled, the Data Catalog uses a customer-provided key to encrypt the password as part of CreateConnection or UpdateConnection and store it in the ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD field in the connection properties. You can enable catalog encryption or only password encryption.

nested_items.name: ReturnConnectionPasswordEncrypted
nested_items.description: When the ReturnConnectionPasswordEncrypted flag is set to 'true', passwords remain encrypted in the responses of GetConnection and GetConnections. This encryption takes effect independently from catalog encryption.

nested_items.name: AwsKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: An KMS key that is used to encrypt the connection password.
